articles.title: Microsoft and Asus open Xbox Ally preorders — the X costs $999 - The Verge
articles.description: The Asus-built Xbox Ally X and Xbox Ally are ready to buy, with Microsoft and Asus opening preorders today for an October 16th sale date.

articles.title: Costco reportedly comments on removing Xbox stock - Windows Central
articles.description: Costco vs. Xbox bust up reportedly confirmed, as the retailer says plans to ditch Xbox consoles was a "business decision," without providing specifics.

articles.title: Nintendo of America President Doug Bowser Steps Down - Variety
articles.description: Nintendo of America president Doug Bowser will retire Dec. 31 after more than a decade at the company.

articles.title: Viral call-recording app Neon goes dark after exposing users' phone numbers, call recordings, and transcripts - TechCrunch
articles.description: Call recording app Neon was one of the top-ranked iPhone apps, but was pulled offline after a security bug allowed any logged-in user to access the call recordings and transcripts of any other user.

articles.title: iPhone 17 Pro cameras reviewed by Halide creator Lux - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Lux, creators of pro camera app Halide, have published their review of the iPhone 17 Pro’s cameras. Here are the highlights.

articles.title: Fire Emblem Shadows impressions: The hottest of hot messes - Polygon
articles.description: Nintendo's new Fire Emblem mobile game is a baffling social deduction experiment weighed down by aggressive pay-to-win mechanics

articles.title: Saros Lead Says Role Is ‘One Of The Best Moments’ Of His Life - Kotaku
articles.description: Rahul Kohli has been in video games before, but he says this gig is ‘a dream come true’

articles.title: AirPods 4 vs. AirPods Pro 3 Buyer's Guide: 25 Differences Compared - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple's standard AirPods offer active noise cancellation for an additional $50, bringing them closer to the AirPods Pro than ever before. But...

articles.title: Apple claims MagSafe stands are responsible for iPhone 17 'Scratchgate' - Mashable
articles.description: Apparently, the scratches aren't even scratches.

articles.title: ‘Ghost of Yotei’ sharpens the samurai revenge formula with raw feeling - The Washington Post
articles.description: The open-world PlayStation epic excels thanks to a revenge story written with precision and heart, backed by a compelling lead performance.

articles.title: Reviewing iOS 26 for power users: Reminders, Preview, and more - Ars Technica
articles.description: These features try to turn iPhones into more powerful work and organization tools.

articles.title: Billionaire Xiaomi Founder Unveils a $630 Answer to iPhone 17 - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Xiaomi Corp.’s billionaire co-founder unveiled a $630 smartphone designed to take on the just-released iPhone 17, underscoring the Chinese company’s broader ambitions to take on US rivals from Apple Inc. to Tesla Inc.

articles.title: How to get free Windows 10 security updates through October 2026 - ZDNET
articles.description: Don't want to fork over $30 to keep getting Windows 10 security updates? Microsoft is offering a couple of ways to avoid the fee, but customers in Europe get the best deal.

articles.title: Mega Evolution Brings Mega Might to Pokémon TCG Live - Pokemon.com
articles.description: The latest expansion brings Mega Evolution Pokémon ex to the game along with some cool updates.

articles.title: The OnePlus 15 gets early reveal, with new image engine and Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 - 9to5Google
articles.description: The OnePlus 15 is shaping up to be a big change for OnePlus, with a rumored new design and the confirmation of a custom image engine.

articles.title: Hades 2 tops Metacritic's PC game chart for 2025 - GamesIndustry.biz
articles.description: Roguelike sequel has beaten the likes of Hollow Knight: Silksong and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

articles.title: Daily Crossword: The School Puzzle — September 25 - Vulture
articles.description: Can you solve the latest Vulture 10x10 daily crossword puzzle clue? 7-Across, Eight Letters: 2018 EP from Megan Thee Stallion

articles.title: OnePlus will be first to launch a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 (not Elite) phone - Android Authority
articles.description: OnePlus has confirmed that it'll offer the first phone with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 processor. And there's good news for global users.
